Target: OntoBatchExperiment is an ontology to represent batch experiments and relevant information.

Comment: A type of experiment or process in which a fixed quantity of materials is processed together in a single batch or lot.
Label: Batch experiment

Comment: A classification or type of batch experiment based on specific criteria or characteristics.
Label: Batch experiment category

Comment: A unique identifier assigned to a batch experiment that is derived from other types of information (e.g. work code, batch number, initials, BatchExperimentCategory).
Label: Identifier

Comment: A confidential internal identifier assigned to a batch experiment.
Label: Work code

Comment: A number assigned to a batch experiment.
Label: Batch number

Comment: A relationship to describe the category of a batch experiment.
Label: has batch experiment category

Range: WorkCode UNION BatchNumber UNION https://www.theworldavatar.com/kg/ontoprofile/Initials UNION BatchExperimentCategory
Comment: A relationship to describe an identifier being derived from other types of information.
Label: is derived from

Comment: A relationship that describes the identifier allocated to a batch experiment.
Label: has identifier

Comment: A relationship that describes the work code allocated to a batch experiment.
Label: has work code

Comment: A relationship that describes the batch number allocated to a batch experiment.
Label: has batch number

Comment: A relationship between a phase component and its acidity.
Label: has acidity

Comment: A relationship between a phase component and its expected acidity.
Label: has expected acidity

Comment: A relationship between a phase component and its amount of substance concentration.
Label: has amount of substance concentration

Comment: A relationship between a phase component and its mass fraction.
Label: has mass fraction
